embeds.title: Hendrickson (Fiche)
embeds.description:
Résumé : Hendrickson
A quirky SR character. Longsword provides team DEF and powerful AoE healing via Ultimate; Dual Swords brings surprising DPS potential through back-attack Crit synergy; Lance is a hidden gem for Darkness compositions thanks to Berserk and Curse stacking.

embeds.title: Overview
embeds.description: A quirky SR character. Longsword provides team DEF and powerful AoE healing via Ultimate; Dual Swords brings surprising DPS potential through back-attack Crit synergy; Lance is a hidden gem for Darkness compositions thanks to Berserk and Curse stacking.
